title: Advanced technologies management for retailing : frameworks and cases
subject: Retail trade -- Automation -- Social aspects
Commerce de détail -- Innovations
Commerce de détail -- Automatisation -- Aspect social
Retail trade -- Management
Retail trade -- Technological innovations
In-store consumers' services
Consumer behavior in ubiquitous environments
Consumers' input modeling
Consumers' knowledge representation
Content management
Ubiquitous computing
Human-computer interaction
Multimodal interaction
Consumers' customized communication
Consumer profiling
format: 1 online resource (electronic texts (327 pages)) : illustrations, digital files
publisher: Hershey, Pa. : IGI Global 701 E. Chocolate Avenue, Hershey, Pennsylvania, 17033, USA
description: "This book contributes to our understanding of applications of new technologies and their impact on the design and development of point of sale systems and on consumers' behavior"--Provided by publisher.
contributor: Timmermans, H. J. P.$$QTimmermans, H. J. P.
contents: 1. Point-of-sale technologies at retail stores: what will the future be like? / Richard Clodfelter -- 2. The evolution tornado retail / Bernd Hallier -- 3. Modeling shopper responses to retail digital signage / Charles Dennis [and others] -- 4. The design of an advanced virtual shopping assistant for improving consumer experience / Vincenzo Corvello, Eleonora Pantano and Assunta Tavernise -- 5. Information and communication technologies in marketing channels: product considerations / Irene Gil Saura, Marta Frasquet Deltoro and Maria Eugenia Ruiz Molina -- 6. International fashion retailing from an enterprise architecture perspective / Torben Tambo -- 7. Frameworks for a consumer's group knowledge representation / Massimo Franco [and others] -- 8. Internet management for communication-distribution interaction as a means to maximize customer consumption experience: the Volagratis case / Claudia Cacia -- 9. Customer intelligence as the powerful means for turning information into profit / Sanda Renko -- 10. Give to get: an experimental study to explore information giving in new technology-based retail / Katia Premazzi, Monica Grosso and Sandro Castaldo -- 11. You never get a second chance to make a first impression: meet your users' expectations regarding Web object placement in online shops / Javier A. Bargas-Avila -- 12. Recommendations to buy in online retailing and their acceptance / Daniel Baier and Eva Stüber -- 13. From user cognition to user interaction modalities in consumer behaviour / Barry Davies.

14. Mobile purchase decision support systems for in-store shopping environments / Tobias Kowatsch, and Wolfgang Maass -- 15. Customer acceptance of a new interactive information terminal in grocery retailing: antecedents and moderators / Stephan Zielke -- 16. Factors affecting WiFi use intention: the context of Cyprus / Despo Ktoridou, Hans-Ruediger Kaufmann and Christos Liassides.
